name: Ideal Geometry Chain Bracelet
description:
Acrylic and gold plated aluminum bracelet.
Using the ‘perfect’ geometry of the Penrose tile, this is a chunky bracelet with gold detailing. It is made from acrylic and gold plated aluminum, and has an adjustable clasp fastening.
It is designed and hand crafted in Australia.

Dimensions: Approx. 20cm long, 7cm wide – the bracelet has an adjustable chain which fits most sizes, however if this is a concern for you just email the store and we can adjust the bracelet accordingly.

This item will be shipped within 24hrs of order being placed.

name: Ideal Geometry Necklace (Small, frosted)
description:
Acrylic and gold plated aluminium necklace.
Using the ‘perfect’ geometry of the Penrose tile, this is a chunky necklace with gold detailing. It is made from acrylic and gold plated aluminum, and has an adjustable clap fastening.
It is designed and hand crafted in Australia.

Dimensions: Approx. 17.5cm wide, 8cm long, 53cm from chain end to clasp – the necklace has an adjustable chain which fits all sizes.

This item will be shipped within 24hrs of order being placed.
